item.title: The Doctor
item.description: The Doctor Little is known about The Doctor outside of the Jackals.

item.title: Silver
item.description: Silver A scout and sniper of the Glowhollow who works both as an unofficial Shardwalker for hire and with the Jackals as a smuggler.

item.title: Octave
item.description: Octave The Jackalsâ€™s resident info-broker and front-liner, Octave is the judge, jury, and executioner of the group.

item.title: Heimdall
item.description: Heimdall Originally born into the high society of the Trinity Kingdom, he ran away from home during his late teenage years which eventually lead to him becoming the leader of the Jackals.

item.title: Jekyll
item.description: Jekyll A support member of the Hellions and the twin brother of Hyde.

item.title: 2025-11-09 Session 1 - Into the Deep End
item.description: Next >> 2025-11-09 Session 1 - Into the Deep End Our characters Ben, Deacon, Neptune, Serra, Soren, and Thalen all meet at an inner city bar.

item.title: Intro
item.description: Intro This section of notes is specifically related to a TTRPG campaign run within the Crystalborne setting.

item.title: Glowhollow
item.description: Glowhollow The undercity of the Trinity Kingdom.

item.title: Operation Hyena
item.description: Operation Hyena An operation carried out by the Arbiters of the Prismatic Guard guard to crush the smuggling groups of the Glowhollow in an effort to reduce illegal activity.

item.title: Deacon
item.description: Deacon Former Shardwalker of the Aetheric Conclave.
